availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Theodore H. Daviess. Mother of Theodore Daviess, Larua Daviess, Caldwell, Daviess, Eugene Daviess, Marion Daviess, Ann M. Daviess, Carrie Lee Daviess, Lee Cardwell Daviess, and Philip T. Daviess. Resident in Mercer County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 1, p. 247B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 606B.
